meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x meets GraphQL
meta.summary: In this blog post, we will look at an example application written in Vert.x that uses the new GraphQL API of Gentics Mesh.

meta.title: TCP Client using Eclipse Vert.x, Kotlin and Gradle build
meta.summary: In this blog post, I demonstrate how to write a very simple TCP client that keeps a connection open to a custom-written server in cloud.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.5.0 released!
meta.summary: The Vert.x team is pleased to announce the release of Eclipse Vert.x 3.5.0.

meta.title: An Introduction to the Vert.x Context Object
meta.summary: Under the hood, the vert.x Context class plays a critical part in maintaining the thread-safety guarantees of verticles. Most of the time, vert.x coders don't need to make use of Context objects directly.

meta.title: JWT Authorization for Vert.x with Keycloak
meta.summary: In this blog post, you'll learn about JWT foundations, protect routes with JWT Authorization, JWT encoded tokens, and RBAC with Keycloak

meta.title: Combine vert.x and mongo to build a giant
meta.summary: This blog post is part of the introduction to Vert.x series. We are now going to replace this JDBC client by the vertx-mongo-client, and thus connect to a Mongo database.
